column1: mpiexec has detected an attempt to run as root.
Running at root is *strongly* discouraged as any mistake (e.g.
defining TMPDIR) or bug can result in catastrophic damage to the OS

column2: leaving your system in an unusable state.

column1: You can override this protection by adding the --allow-run-as-root
option to your cmd line. However
against doing so - please do so at your own risk.
